short_summary: Event B - Flings Brook Dam Decommissioning.
description: Decommissioning of Freswater Dam in Flings Brook.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Event B - Decommissioning of Flings Brook Dam

**Reference Number:** WS4167697991

**Publication Date:** 2023-10-19
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-11-14T14:00:00 (Expired)

**Notice Type:** RFP against Supply Arrangement (EB129-192368)
 
**Description:** 

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) invites proposals from consultants for professional services required to prepare construction documents for the decommissioning of Flings Brook Dam structure and contaminated soil, followed by site restoration at the Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) St. John’s Research and Development Centre.

**Requirement Highlights:**

* Removal of the existing concrete dam structure
* Contaminated soil extraction and site restoration
* Restoration of the natural stream

**Prequalified Firms:**

* Invited firms who qualified under the Municipal discipline for the province of Newfoundland and Labrador are as follows: 
    Stantec, 
    R.V. Anderson Associates Ltd, 
    CIMA+, 
    Wood Canada Ltd., 
    Dillon Consulting, 
    CBCL Ltd., 
    and Meridian Engineering Inc.

**Bid Selection Criteria:**

The selection will be based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

**Proposal Instructions:**

* Submissions must be made via SAP Ariba by the closing date.
* Proposals may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Additional Information:**

* Request for debriefing on bid solicitation results may be made within 15 working days from receipt of notification of unsuccessful bid submission.
* Services are available in English.

---

I rewrote the tender announcement in a more professional manner while keeping the essential information intact. I provided clear headings and formatted the text in a readable markdown format. 

Please note that I have a limitation of 400 words to work with, so I prioritized the most essential information. If you need me to add more details, I can certainly help. Let me know!
